EmailTemplate.name: work detail: Awaiting work order owner update
EmailTemplate.subject: Work Order:Field Compliance Review
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear {!SVMXC__Service_Order__c.OwnerFullName}, You are receiving this automated email to provide updates to {!SVMXC__Service_Order_Line__c.Number} {!SVMXC__Service_Order_Line__c.SVMXC__Service_Order__c} as requested by Field Compliance upon Work Order review. Field Compliance Review line comment: {!SVMXC__Service_Order__c.Verification_Comments__c} When updates are made or additional guidance is needed, contact your regional Field Compliance team.
